text: Cercosaura quadrilineata, the lined many-fingered teiid, is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is endemic to Brazil. ==References== Category:Cercosaura Category:Reptiles of Brazil Category:Endemic fauna of Brazil Category:Reptiles described in 1876 Category:Taxa named by Oskar Boettger
title: Cercosaura quadrilineata
